body.name: Logitech G Yeti Orb Condenser RGB Gaming Microphone with LIGHTSYNC, USB Mic for Streaming, Cardioid, USB Plug and Play for PC/Mac - Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 13 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset.

features: It’s that easy: Logitech G Yeti Orb is a premium RGB gaming microphone with LIGHTSYNC that delivers best-in-class audio performance and ease of use via a simple USB connection
LIGHTSYNC RGB lights: RGB logo and status light work with LIGHTSYNC in G HUB to enable custom illumination effects and adapt to your play for a more immersive gaming experience
Condenser mic capsule: Optimized for game streaming, the condenser capsule features a cardioid pickup pattern that zeroes in on your voice, reducing key clicks and other noise
USB plug and play: Yeti Orb is the easiest way to bring clear, focused sound to your gaming and content creation; just plug in the USB cable and you’re ready to go
Total software control with G HUB: Access controls for your Yeti Orb mic and all your Logitech G gear including gaming mice, keyboards, Litra lights and more, all in one place
body.description: Logitech G Yeti Orb is a premium RGB gaming microphone that delivers best-in-class audio performance and ease of use over a simple USB connection. The RGB logo and status light work with LIGHTSYNC to enable custom lighting effects that adapt to your play for an immersive gaming experience. The condenser capsule features a cardioid pickup pattern, fine-tuned to focus on your voice and ignore outside noise. Plug in via USB and you’re ready to join the voice chat, stream, and create video content with a massive jump in your vocal quality – instantly. Use Blue VO!CE presets to dial in your sound fast, prevent clipping, and add fun effects. Control your whole setup at once with G HUB. It’s that easy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How do I know if my Yeti Orb microphone is active and recording? LED colors are used to indicate three different states: Power on — white Active — green Mute — red G HUB can be used to customize the Power On and Active states. Mute will always be red and cannot be customized. My Gaming mic won’t turn on. The LED on the microphone indicates that it’s on. If not: Try a different USB cable with the same port. Try a different USB type-A port with the original supplied cable. If using an adapter, use a 1 to 1 adapter. Avoid using hubs or docks My Gaming mic does not pick up audio on my macOS computer. 1. Confirm the Gaming Mic is listed. ● Go to Apple > System Preferences>click the Sound icon. 2. On the Input tab, click on the Mic to select it as your default input device. ● Disconnect other devices. ● Disconnect your Mic, then reconnect My Gaming mic is not picking up audio on my Windows computer. The microphone may not be selected as the default recording device. To set: ● Settings > Privacy > Microphone and making sure that everything is enabled for use with the mic. ● Access your Sound Menu to confirm the Mic is recognized Do I need Logi G HUB software for my Yeti Orb? You can use your Yeti Orb with or without G HUB software You can customize the following features using G Hub: Blue VO!CE Samplers LIGHTSYNC LED customization
IMMERSIVE PLAY WITH LIGHTSYNC Yeti Orb’s built-in RGB logo and status light work with LIGHTSYNC to enable custom lighting effects.
FOCUSED ON YOUR VOICE Condenser mic capsule optimizes your voice, reducing noises that get in the way of your play.

TOTAL CONTROL WITH G HUB Use G HUB to control your Yeti Orb mic and all your Logitech G gear in one easy-to-use desktop window. SLEEK DESIGN, MADE FOR VIDEO Yeti Orb has a sleek, clean, camera-ready design that brings a streamlined look to your content.
EASY SETUP, ENDLESS FUN Blue VO!CE software lets you protect against clipping and add fun effects to entertain your audience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Logitech G Yeti Orb: Illuminating Excellence in Gaming Audio
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech G Yeti Orb Condenser RGB Gaming Microphone has elevated my streaming experience. The LIGHTSYNC technology not only adds a dynamic flair to my setup but also enhances the overall aesthetics. The cardioid pickup pattern ensures clear and focused audio, perfect for capturing my voice without background noise. The USB plug-and-play feature for both PC and Mac makes setup a breeze. It's a sleek and reliable addition to any gaming or streaming setup, providing top-notch performance with a touch of RGB brilliance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound & Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Great sound and a nice sleek compact look. It plugs in and works quickly and easily on both Windows and Mac with no setup. I love the look as it actually compliments my workspace versus cluttering it. Great price, great look and great quality. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean, Sleek, Great Sound !
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the Logitech Yeti GX microphone, and it's been a game-changer for me. It's not just good-looking on my desk, but it also sounds amazing and is super easy to use.Setting it up was a piece of cake. I just plugged it into my computer, and I was good to go. It feels really sturdy and well-made, so I know it'll last.The best part is how clear it makes my voice sound. It cancels out background noise so well, whether I'm recording, streaming, or on a video call. Plus, it can do different sound settings for different situations.The buttons on it are simple to use. You can adjust the volume and turn it on or off easily. It even has cool colored lights on the bottom that you can change to match your style or link it to other Logitech color schemes w/ the LG Hub Software.In short, the Logitech Yeti GX microphone is a fantastic choice if you're into creating content, streaming, or just want better sound quality for your calls. It looks great, sounds great, and is super easy to use. I'm really happy with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far my experience has been a good one.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had my new Logitech gaming microphone for a couple weeks now and I am happy with my purchase. The look and style and performance is very professional and aesthetically pleasing. I love that this microphone is a quick use dynamic mic that is plug and play. I like that the blue voice software is optional to use for adjusting sounds settings and or adding additional effects and features. But this microphone is simple to manage the volume control directly on the microphone which can be set and locked. I’m currently using for my game play, as well as my live streams, so the noise cancellation is a big help when I’m clicking my mouse or if there any unwanted background noises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact mic with a punch
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a replacement mic and picked this up. I am actually shocked by the sound quality. I was able to plug and play right out of the box without having to touch any settings and it sounded good. I’m sure you can get even better quality out of the sound if you tweak the settings. Also the rgb light is really cool and you can adjust that as well in the software. I highly recommend this microphone. Definitely a great quality for the price. I would have paid twice the amount for it. And it’s super light and easy to move if you record podcast or anything on the go

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded to this from a blue “snowball” mic. I didn’t need to, but I did anyway. I was told this mic sounded like a “podcast mic”. Just a crisp, accurate mic sound. Plus all my other peripheral’s are Logitech. So it fits into my setup really nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is top notch
reviews.reviewText: The materials feel cool to the touch. The sound is crisp and doesn’t sound muffled or overly dramatic. It’s an absolute breeze to install and put together with one wire. It’s compact and looks like something from a space ship with its cool colors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the noise cancelling was the selling point for me. Using with MAC and Windows, using USB switch!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I would not use this for music (you need the $5000 mics to sound your best), but I would use this for basic voice and especially for dictation. It cancels noise, for me, and does not pick up sound or voices that are farther away than say, 2 or 3 feet, including my own. I like that. It means I can talk my words into a software program on MAC or WINDOWS. When I have Microsoft Word open on both, and have the same file open, if I dictate into one the same words are popping up simultaneously on BOTH the Windows and Mac machines' screens. It's cool and this must be a benefit of this mic. This mic is hearing me really well as it cancels out all other noises. That makes the dictation work much faster. This mic is a champ and works great on Mac OS X (on my Mac mini M2 Studio) and also on Windows 10 (my Microsoft Surface Studio computer). It switches seamlessly without glitch, ALWAYS at the press of a button my my recently installed USB Switch Selector box. I have the mic mounted to an arm of my WALI computer desktop pole which hangs a lot of stuff including the USB switch box, headphones, and lights, etc.
Nice plug and play Mic pick up my voice clearly, too bad no mute button on the mic,but that can be fix with keyboard software.

This product stopped working after 2 weeks and the RGB on the back is the dumbest thing i have ever used on a MIC. DO NOT BUY . For the price of this mic just spend more money and buy the SHURE MV7 USB.

only buy this if you are using in a CLOSED room, it will pick up pretty much everything in background (messed around in ghub for hours and could not make it work for me. does have decent sound quality though and looks good on your desk
I've ordered 2 of them and both of them have been completely defective with constant noise and static
